Name: Finellen Stavenger
Trait: I can never allow my foes to get the drop on me.
Ideal: Unpredictability. Keeping the enemy guessing and off-balance is my tactical strength. (Chaos)
Bond: I’ll never let my fellow insurgents down. They are my only remaining friends.
Flaw: Ale is the only way I can escape the desperation of my circumstances.
Equipment: ['Light Hammer', 'Mace', 'Light Crossbow', '20 Bolts', 'Studded Leather Armor', "Thieves' Tools", "Dungeoneer's Pack", '20 Caltrops', 'Small Trinket of a Previous Life', "Healer's Kit", 'Set of Dark Common Clothes with a Cloak and Hood', '5 GP']

Name: Nikolas Dundragon
Specialty: River of Shadows. Your riverboat accidentally slipped through the veil into the Shadowfell for several hours. While you were there, you sold some stolen dragonborn artifacts before returning to this plane and paddling home.
Trait: I am no common criminal; I am a mastermind.
Ideal: Peace and Prosperity I smuggle only to achieve a greater goal that benefits my community. (Good)
Bond: My vessel was stolen from me, and I burn with the desire to recover it.
Flaw: I struggle to trust the words of others.
Equipment: ['Greatclub', 'Component Pouch', "Scholar's Pack", 'Leather Armor', 'Sickle', '2 Daggers', 'Fancy Leather Vest or Leather Boots', 'Set of Common Clothes', '15 GP']

Name: Jella Barns
Trait: I love, fight, and feast with equal zeal. (Hazoret)
Ideal: Knowledge. The worthy shall cultivate a nimble mind, so as to perceive the wonders beyond imagination that wait in the afterlife. (Kefnet)
Bond: I love my god and never want my service to end. (Hazoret)
Flaw: I secretly believe the God-Pharaoh’s return will not bring blessing to this world.
Spells Known: ['Guidance', 'Spare the Dying', 'Light', 'Healing Word', 'Ceremony', 'Purify Food and Drink', 'Inflict Wounds', 'Sanctuary']
Equipment: ['Warhammer', 'Leather Mail', 'Light Crossbow', '20 Bolts', "Priest's Pack", 'Shield', 'Holy Symbol', "Set of Artisan's Tools or Musical Instrument", "Scroll of your God's Teachings", "Vizier's Cartouche", 'Set of Fine Clothes', '25 GP']

Name: Iafalior Black
Trait: I'm always looking to improve efficiency.
Ideal: Innovation Abandon old traditions and find better ways to do things. (Chaotic)
Bond: My house is my family. I would do anything for it.
Flaw: My house and blood line make me the best!
Equipment: ['Shortbow', "Explorer's Pack", '10 Darts', 'Set of Fine Clothes', 'Signet Ring of your House', 'Identification Papers', '20 GP']
Background Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

Name: Artin Steelman
Trait: I have different assumptions from those around me concerning personal space, blithely invading others' space in innocence, or reacting to ignorant invasion of my own.
Ideal: Open. I have much to learn from the kindly folk I meet along my way. (Good)
Bond: I hold no greater cause than my service to my people.
Flaw: I consider the adherents of other gods to be deluded innocents at best, or ignorant fools at worst.
Equipment: ['Leather Armor', 'Greatclub', 'Javelin', "Explorer's Pack", 'Longbow', '20 Arrows', 'Quiver', "Set of Traveler's Clothes", 'Musical Instrument or Gaming Set', 'Poorly Wrought Maps from Hometown', 'Small Jewelery from your Hometown worth 10 GP', '5 GP']
